displaytitle: Holy Family with Gabriel and a Prophet
creditline: Gift of Henry White Cannon Jr., Class of 1910, in memory of his Father

titles.title: Holy Family with Gabriel and a Prophet

texts.textentryhtml:
Lodovico Moscardo (1611-1681), Verona. Giovanni Francesco Sambonifacio (1784-1854), Verona. Count Portalupi (?-?), Verona; Purchased from him by Jean Paul Richter (1847-1937) in Verona in June 1887; Purchased from him by Henry White Cannon (1850-1934) in Florence on March 10, 1906; By descent to this son, Henry (Harry) W. Cannon, Jr. (1887-1966), Class of 1910; Donated to the Museum in 1935.

[Mentioned in Giovanni Battista da Persico's Descrizione di Verona (Verona, 1820), Parte II, p. 32: "una Madonna in atto di allattare il bambino, bella pittura del Liberale, ch'era della galleria Moscardo."]
